_sText:
Hello this is my 2. Bossfight map

It has 4 difficult settings.
Easy
Medium
Hard
Hardcore

you gain access to hard if you beat medium
and hardcore if you beat hard

Map has spawnkiller
Secret nades
HP scales with amount of players
Boss is a complete remake from Terranigma an old snes game. The lobby room from Pic 1 is also a 3d remake from a room in this game

This release is already V3 because V1 had bugs when tested and V2 Boss was extreme unbalanced
So boss got nerved hard in V3
Boss seems easy to kill alone but on servers it get harder

There are 40 Spawns but 20 Players should be the maximum
Because more than 20makes Teamfight impossible (everyone do what he wants)

In future things that a Bossfight server would need is:
Money giver like in ZE
Restrict Flash nades and smoke nades
And disalow spawning when dead (even if spawnkiller autokills them, the spawning still takes serverpower

A server with 2 x 20 people or better 4 x 10 people is better than a Overcrowdet 1 x 40 server
